snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic will meet second-ranked Andy Murray in a blockbuster final at the Madrid Open after beating Kei Nishikori 6-3 7-6 (4) on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic will meet second-ranked Andy Murray in a blockbuster final at the Madrid Open after beating Kei Nishikori 6-3 7-6 (4) on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Meet Murray in Blockbuster Final
headline.main: Djokovic to Meet Murray in Blockbuster Final
